project_id.title: ﻿Project_ID
project_id.description: A unique identifier for an application, study or award. The identifier is maintained through and beyond the full lifetime of the project / award

orcid.title: ORCiD
orcid.description: ORCID identifier of the individual person from personal registration with the ORCID registry: www.orcid.org

award_holder_name.title: Award_Holder_Name
award_holder_name.description: Full name of the individual(s) with the role of 'Award Holder' / 'Chief Investigator' in Involvement_Type

involvement_type.title: Involvement_Type
involvement_type.description:
Textual description of the instance of a person’s role in the context of the research project / award at a point in time (reporting date). See the HRA website for definition of Chief Investigator: http://www.hra.nhs.uk/resources/before-you-apply/roles-and-responsibilties/chief-investigator/
Values can include:
Award Holder
Chief Investigator
